data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Guerrero, Mexico.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guerrero, Mexico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Guerrero will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Over 4.69 percent of the people of Guerrero are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, encourage your church in Guerrero that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.4% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Guerrero, Mexico.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Guerrero, Mexico.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Guerrero, Mexico. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
